## Video Generator part of the Chatacter Backend
### Installations (uv)

```bash
uvx --python 3.10 visualizr
```

### Installations (Docker)

```bash
curl -o compose.yaml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/alphaspheredotai/visualizr/main/compose.yaml
docker compose up
```
